Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Gashouse in 1975...
Traded from Gashouse to Wisconsin on 3/2/1975 (Going to GHG: P J. Bodden. Going to WIS: P A. Zamora)...
Injured on 6/24/1977 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/7/1978 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/19/1982 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 7/21/1982 (Going to WIS: C J. Bustillos, CF G. Albino, P R. Gallegos. Going to PIT: RF J. Cardella, 2B A. Gies, P A. Zamora, C S. Nolan)...
Had first career hit on 8/7/1983, off Mike Davis (BC)...
Earned first career win on 9/9/1983...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Struck out 15 batters against Manchester on 7/24/1987...
